name: Wrong Side Runner
description:
Wrong side runner is an Arcade like Game made with Pygame by MIJ Games.

You would be driving your Car on Wrong Side of the Track.

In this Game you have to avoid hitting Other Cars.

You can move your Car using Arrow keys or W, A, S, D keys.

You can also pause your Game by clicking on Pause button on Top Right corner of Game Window.

No Credits, This Game is completely made by a solo GameDev.
